attributes.action: Allow the Dr David Kelly "inquest" to be published.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We have found out that this currently will not become public knowledge for 70 years!  Why?  What has the government got to hide?

The inquest is surely about how Dr. Kelly met his death and so if there is nothing to hide, there is no reason to keep the verdit and evidence secret for 70 years.

The Prime Minister MUST do everything in his power to get this information released into the public domain forthwith.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
